article_text: The Kansas City-based tax preparation company has “committed more resources” than any other tax company to the act’s impact on Americans’ tax returns. Still, it’s not factoring in a bump to the number of tax filings likely next year.

article_metadata.news-keywords: H&R block, tax, earnings, first quarter
article_metadata.title: H&R Block getting ready for the Affordable Care Act’s impact on tax season next year | The Kansas City Star

article_summary:
The Kansas City-based tax preparation company has “committed more resources” than any other tax company to the act’s impact on Americans’ tax returns.
Still, it’s not factoring in a bump to the number of tax filings likely next year.
